title: "Drug Code"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```

## Data Import

```{r}
drug_raw =
  read_csv("./data/drugs.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()
```

## Data Cleaning

```{r}
drug_data =
  drug_raw %>%
  select(year, state, x12_17, x12_20, x18_25, x26, contains("marijuana")) %>%
  select(-contains("except_marijuana")) %>% 
  gather(key = drug, value = amount, rates_marijuana_new_users_12_17:totals_marijuana_used_past_year_26) %>%
  separate(drug, into = c("1", "2", "3", "4", "5", "6", "7"), sep = "_")
```
